about_the_game:
Zhouyi Six Lines Divination Game is an innovative spiritual sustenance game aimed at helping players explore the mysteries of the future through the combination of ancient divination wisdom and modern AI technology. In this game, players can not only experience professional and scientific hexagram interpretation, but also obtain deep spiritual comfort through meditation.

Core functions
  • 1. Six line divination
Ancient wisdom: Based on the hexagram divination technique in the ancient Chinese Book of Changes, players can predict the future and explore the unknown by shaking the hexagram.
Easy operation: Users only need simple operations to complete divination, making it easy to get started.

  • 2. Professional AI divination
Big Model AI: The game is equipped with advanced big model AI, which interprets the Six Trigrams through the standard Eight Trigrams of the Book of Changes, resulting in professional and scientific results.
Accurate analysis: AI provides detailed explanations and guidance based on hexagrams, helping players better understand what they are occupying.

  • 3. Meditation session
Spiritual Comfort: In the game, there is a special meditation session to help players relax and relieve stress before and after divination.
Guided meditation: Through voice and text guidance, players can meditate in a quiet environment, gaining inner peace and strength.

Usage scenario
  • 1. Provide spiritual support
The hexagram divination game is particularly suitable for those who encounter confusion and uncertainty in life. Through divination and meditation, games can effectively alleviate their anxiety and provide spiritual support and comfort.

  • 2. Enhance inner strength
For players seeking strength and direction in life, the meditation session in the game can help them improve their focus and inner peace, thereby enhancing their sense of control over life.

  • 3. Seeking answers
Whether it's work, love, family, or other issues, players can seek answers and guidance through the hexagram divination, so they can face future challenges with more confidence.

Product advantages
  • 1. Combining ancient wisdom with modern technology
The game integrates ancient Chinese divination wisdom and modern AI technology, providing professional and scientific divination results, meeting the dual needs of modern people for mysterious culture and technological power.
  • 2. A comprehensive and profound spiritual experience
Not only divination, but also meditation in the game is equally important, which can help players obtain comprehensive psychological and spiritual support, becoming a spiritual refuge and comfort.
  • 3. Easy to use and rich experience
The game is easy to operate, user-friendly, and users can easily get started, enjoying a rich experience of divination and meditation.
